text: @realDonaldTrump Every adolescent wants to jump in a car & drive!Drivers Ed is vital,America benefiting of correct procedures Coronavirus is Paramount.Please do not cause more unnecessary deaths or let needed funds slip through Liberties Hands for GOP greed & Reckless decision making.
